thread.title: Jeremy Jay Lee AUSTIN-SKIDMORE
thread.title_full: Clean Republic Hill Topper Electric Bike Kit reviewed by Jeremy Jay Lee AUSTIN-SKIDMORE

author: Jeremy Jay Lee AUSTIN-SKIDMORE
title: Jeremy Jay Lee AUSTIN-SKIDMORE
text:
I ride to work. I have to.
This little thing has LITTERALLY saved my life (dodging a car). Its saved me hours of riding, even saving the batteries just for the hills.
Its gotten me out of three snowstorms THIS WEEK.
The only thing I do wish was different is the throttle (using a rotational grip throttle), but if that's the only issue, I'm blessed. I've even shared this kit on facebook (in a couple of groups).
